title: GazetaBitcoin
author: GazetaBitcoin
created_time: March 17, 2023, 09:48:54 PMLast edit: July 17, 2024, 08:15:59 AM by GazetaBitcoin
content: ChipMixer campaign ended abruptly on March 15, 2023 and I was part of it. As a consequence, my signature space is available for rent.My avatar is currently rented by Foxpup, so I can only offer my signature space. If needed, I may also rent my Personal Text, although I would prefer to keep it personal.What I will win from this deal: a fair amount for renting my signature space.What you will win from this deal: a serious user, with good reputation on the forum, wearing your signature, bringing more visibility about your business.What I can tell you about me is the following:I was part of the ChipMixer signature campaign since February 2021 until it ended. This campaign was known for accepting only very high-quality posters.According to bpip, I am the 30nd user with most earned merit and 36th user with most merit. At same time, I am the third most merited user by theymos.While having 7000+ merits, my current merit vs. activity ratio is of 3.99 and my merit vs. posts ratio is 1.42, being one of the few users which ever managed to achieve (and keep) a number of merits higher than the number of posts. I am also one of the very few users which ever sent and received multiple 50-merit bombs.Considering the moment when I earned my first merit, it took me 2 weeks for reaching the 10 merits necessary for Member rank, 27 days for reaching the 100 merits necessary for Full Member rank, 3.5 months for reaching the 250 merits necessary for Sr. Member rank, 5.5 months for reaching the 500 merits necessary for Hero rank and 357 days for reaching the 1000 merits necessary for Legendary rank. I am the first Romanian member which becomes Legendary after the merit system was implemented, by starting from scratch.I am posting in various boards and I was merited in 28 different boards.I am DT member since March 2022.I've created many historic and educational topics. A part of them can be found here. As it can be seen, multiple users are translating my articles in their languages. So far, my topics have been translated 158 times, in 12 languages.I am the Romanian translator of Bitcoin white paper from bitcoin.org. At same time, I am one of forum's best translators, collaborating, so far, with users like fillippone, 1miau, LoyceV, Little Mouse and others. My full portfolio can be found here. Recently I also became part of [AOBT] The Alliance Of Bitcointalk Translators.I am one of forum's best reporters, with more than 60.000 good reports. In September 2021, according to an announcement made by theymos, I was the fourth most efficient reporter of year 2020. For all the work I did, I won BitcoinTalk Community Events 2022 edition, at Best SpamBuster category. At same time, I was chosen by icopress for helping him with votes counting of Bitcointalk Community Awards 2021 edition and with some more organizing of the 2022 edition of this wonderful contest (votes counting, establishing rules, suggestions, maintaining the historic quiz topic etc.).Together with 1miau, I involved in a campaign for improving posting quality for local boards. While the results of the campaign can not be quantified with numbers, the outcomes, so far, are promising.After months of investigative work and after many unsuccessful attempts performed by many others, I managed to find the truth about paraipan, ex-forum treasurer which held 250 BTC. Investigation showed he did not steal the coins.Needless to say, I am one of the only 6 users wearing Foxpup's avatar, being accepted in the Merit Cycling Club in January 2021.You can read more about me inside my reputation thread.Please let me know if you are interested.Topic is self-moderated for avoiding spam.

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Dear GazetaBitcoin! I wish you all the best to find a profitable Signature deal.  As an established Bitcointalk member and quality poster myself, I can confirm that renting GazetaBitcoin's Signature space, will really get you a good bang for your buck.  GazetaBitcoin's post are always very visible and elaborated and GazetaBitcoin is additionally advocating for a better posting quality on the forum, which we did (and still do) in a broad campaign also on our local boards (Romanian and German) as already outlined in the OP. Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on March 17, 2023, 09:48:54 PMChipMixer campaign ended abruptly on March 15, 2023 and I was part of it. As a consequence, my signature space is available for rent....What I can tell you about me is the following:I was part of the ChipMixer signature campaign since February 2023 until it ended. This campaign was known for accepting only very high-quality posters.It should be even longer, since February 2022, but I agree to you that it ended far to quick. So after all, I can definitely recommend a cooperation with GazetaBitcoin as GazetaBitcoin has always shown to be trustworthy and reliable.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on March 17, 2023, 09:48:54 PMNeedless to say, I am one of the only 5 users wearing Foxpup's avatar, being accepted in the Merit Cycling Club in January 2021.Oh snap, I didn't realize there were only 5 in his furry highness's campaign!  I knew there weren't many, but dang.If you were in the Chipmixer campaign, you probably shouldn't even have to list all your forum accomplishments to get interested advertisers, because that campaign was just so damn selective for quality posters that any prospective renter of your sig space ought to assume it's worth the money spent.Good luck with this, GazetaBitcoin.  I thought of making a thread similar to this one, but after looking at it I feel as small as a neutron.  If you asked me what I've accomplished on bitcointalk since becoming a member I'd probably just stare stupidly off into space.  Derrp.
